title: Help
body: I was playing league but my dad keeps forcing me to disconnect and now i am at the verge of getting banned. What should i dp

replies.body:
Continuously disconnecting from matches and leaving your teammates behind is definitely not something I'd recommend you continue to do. While it probably won't get you *Banned*, it could definitely land you in a *low-priority queue*, causing you to have to wait a bit before being able to queue for matches. You may want to check in with your Dad before playing League to ensure you have enough time to play a match so you won't have to disconnect again.

If you have any other questions, please let me know.
If I were you...I would play League whenever you can.If your dad lets you,play.Just find time to play and I think you'll be fine.
